Paul Palmer studies the atmosphere on Earth and other planets using data, models, and theory. 

## Education

- [D.Phil. in Physics]{.fw-bold} | University of Oxford | 1995 - 1998
- [B.Sc. in Physics]{.fw-bold} | University of Bristol | 1992 - 1995

## Professional Experience

- [2006-present:]{.fw-bold} Professor (2009-), Lecturer (2006-2009), University of Edinburgh
- [1995-2006:]{.fw-bold} University Research Fellow, University of Leeds, 2005-2006
- [1999-2005:]{.fw-bold} Postdoctoral Researcher/Research Associate, Harvard University, 1999-2005
